summary:
Hi there, I'm Wayne Zhong. I am a code-monkey in China, focus on web backend development. I hava a solid experience in the semiconductor industry for 5 years and information technology industry for 5 years.
Throughout my career, I hava built a number of large-scale, cross-country web systems and operation tools, most of them are still running in productions.
I love open source and hope to contribute to open source projects.
